action.action-desc: Mr. Joyce of Ohio (for himself and Mr. Carter of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To increase the authorization of appropriations for grants to States to defray the expenses of the States related to the establishment and operation of a State underground injection control program for permitting Class VI wells for the injection of carbon dioxide.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Efforts to Create Underground Regulatory Efficiency Act or the SECURE Act.

section.header: Authorization for State permitting program grants
